Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{A number of \{ men \| women \| women and children \| children \| people \} dressed in \{ rags \| tattered garments \| dingy clothes \| threadbare clothing \} \{ bustle \| scurry \| hurry \| walk \} through the area, \{ nervously glancing over their shoulders \| suspiciously clutching their belongings \| anxiously avoiding eye contact \| hushedly whispering amongst themselves\} as they depart further down the road. \|In the distance, the sound of \{ loud arguing \| a woman crying \| a baby wailing \| a scuffle \| men in heated dispute \| children sobbing \| a woman’s scream \} can just barely be heard over the sounds of the city. \|\{ Striding \| Pacing \| Stalking \| Jogging \| Skulking \} through the area, a \{ dark-cloaked \| poorly dressed \| hulking \| dour-faced \} man passes through the area. He \{ narrows his eyes at you \| grunts softly \| scowls angrily \| suspiciously eyes you \| makes a crude gesture \| smirks acridly \} before disappearing into the distance. \|A passing individual in \{ fine \| wealthy \| opulent \| upscale \} garments tosses a scrap of \{ food \| bread \| fruit \} over his shoulder. Before long, a \{ group of \| few \| number of \| couple of \} \{ small \| dirty \| waifish \| skinny \| emaciated \} children appear out of nowhere to fight over the morsel before disappearing back where they came from. \|A soft creaking sound fills the area as one of the nearby buildings shift and groan under the weight of time and disrepair. \|A tiny little girl huddled in the small space between two nearby buildings sings a faint, forlorn hymn to herself. She becomes startled as she notices your attention and retreats farther into the shadows. \|A tall man in a dark cloak stalks through the area, muttering harshly under his breath, "You shouldn’t be here..." as he disappears down the street. \|A monk in drab vestments slowly trudges through the area, mumbling soft prayers and haphazardly splashing Holy water here and there as he moves by. \} \ \}
